Reviews.Content: stayed property 7 november 2 nights attend exhibition london site keys collected via safe code provided keys fit wrong apartment reasonable size sofa dirty walls scuffed bed linen towels thin matress lumpy construction door workman starting 630 onwards £150 night apartments value money serious upgrading

Reviews.Title: “SHAMBLES”
Reviews.Author: tripper_a
Reviews.Content: booked guests looks nice pictures cramped surroundings building horrible absolutely customer service rang hours approximately 525 closed emergency told leave message guests didnt move hotel definitely recommend joyful travel experience allthough guess price ok

Reviews.Title: “Really good location”
Reviews.Author: sunshinePrescot
Reviews.Content: stayed apartment situated 2nd floor nights 4 adults apartments situated fleet street ideal location exploring london short safe walk covent garden apartments clean tidy little worn ie flooring scuffed bathroom tlc enjoyed stay stay mainly location spend time anyway apartment moment lots building woken 630am due noise hot water generated boiler 1 person luxury hot shower people getting ready morning
